channel.description: Week 9 Announcements This Week Lab 4 Due Lab 5 Content Next Week Lab 5 Lab 4 Grading Windows Server Windows AD User/Group Windows -> AD OpenLDAP User/Group Ubuntu -> LDAP Ubuntu -> AD Success Read Carefully See Posted Diagrams Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Lab 5 Move to Cloud 2 Droplets on DO Set up SSH & Firewall Simple Apache Sites DNS Name Docker Reverse Proxy GitHub Pack https://education.
